hero.subheading: Save 50-80% vs. buying. Access thousands of items with

how_it_works.section_subtitle: Renting outdoor gear is simple and secure. Get started in minutes.
how_it_works.step_1_description: Find gear near you from thousands of local listings
how_it_works.step_2_description: Pick your dates and send a booking request to the owner
how_it_works.step_3_description: Pick up from the owner and enjoy your adventure
how_it_works.step_4_description: Return the gear and leave feedback for the community

social_proof.section_subtitle: Join thousands of happy renters and owners in the RentAloo community
social_proof.testimonial_1_text: Saved over $800 renting ski equipment for our family trip to Tahoe. The gear was in excellent condition and the owner was incredibly helpful!
social_proof.testimonial_2_text: As someone who loves trying new sports, RentAloo is perfect. I've rented everything from kayaks to camping gear without breaking the bank.
social_proof.testimonial_3_text: I've made over $1,200 in 3 months renting out my mountain bike and camping gear. It's amazing passive income from stuff I wasn't using!

owner_cta.subheading: Turn your unused equipment into a steady income stream. Join thousands of owners making money from gear they already own.
owner_cta.placeholder_title: Your equipment could be earning right now
